abstract.t: This document specifies KHALED Routing Protocol (KRP) which is an Exterior Gateway Protocol (EGP) that introduces a new way of routing IP packets from the source to the destination through different Autonomous Systems (ASs). The enhancements that KRP adds are: a) Decreasing the BGP routing table. b) Enhancing the routing function. c) Enhancing the QoS. KRP sometimes referred to as Regional Routing Protocol (RRP).
